content: 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 52 56 60 64 sts marker then pick up 1 stitch for every 2 row of heel flap repeat rnds 2 3 until you have 28 28 32 32 sts left and knitted up the other side of the heel knit across the top of the divide these between two needles so that front and back heel and then shape gusset and at the same time work rib of socks match pattern across the top of the foot graft toes using kitchener stitch weave in all ends and sew up the small gap at the cuff where you cast on note if you are using dpns and/or have placed your stitches on a stitch holder you can arrange the needles as follows needle 1 for stitches across heel needle 2 for picked-up stitches down side of foot needle 3 for stitches across top of foot work stitches off stitch holder if required needle 4 for picked-up stitches on other side of foot you may find that stitch markers are not required at first 8 charts for left sock for 1st size only repeat 30 sts twice key for 2nd size only repeat 32 sts twice key 9 charts for left sock for 3rd size only repeat 34 sts twice key for 4th size only repeat 36 sts twice key 10 charts for right sock for 1st size only repeat 30 sts twice key for 2nd size only repeat 32 sts twice key 11 charts for right sock for 3rd size only repeat 34 sts twice key for 4th size only repeat 36 sts twice key 12 disclaimer please note that quantities are based on average usage and therefore are approximate we cannot accept responsibility for the finished items if any yarn other than the one specified is used queries although every effort has been made to ensure that instructions are correct west yorkshire spinners cannot accept any liabilities for any pattern queries please visit wyspinners com/errata or contact owing to photography and printing restrictions the colour reproduction knitting@wyspinners com is matched as closely as possible to the yarn wys1000363 42 60 follow us join our facebook community wys crafter s hub 5 053682 006490 2 airedale park royd ings avenue keighley west yorkshire bd21 4dg +44 0 1535 664500 sales@wyspinners com wyspinners com
